name: StatsQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open stats quiz”
”Alexa, start stats quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stats quiz
des: Play an interesting game of statistics quiz with Alexa. It helps to quickly review fundamental statistics concepts and prepares for business statistics or introductory statistics courses. While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
